description:
For over 25 years, Comtech Satellite Network Technologies Corp. has been leading the modernization of ANSP networks. Our science and technology enhance society's well-being and create critical innovations that drive scientific advances for the future. We conduct groundbreaking research and development, design and manufacture leading-edge products, and deliver critical services for commercial and government customers. Comtech is committed to driving innovation today and for generations to come. Our company is not your average technology company, you will be working with the best and brightest. We pride ourselves in our team-oriented company culture, where we work at a fast pace, but with tremendous support. We are growing, giving our employees tremendous potential for growth in our brand new facility in Quebec. We provide stability to employees, where you can count on comprehensive benefits package that includes, medical, dental, eye care, and life insurance. Our employees work hard and for that dedication we also have a profit sharing plan and vested pension plan. Interested in learning more? See details below for responsibilities, skills and requirements of this position. Purpose This engineering position involves the design of embedded software for use in satellite and wireless systems. Responsibilities bull Develop embedded software based on C and GCC bull Develop or customize software for our clients to provide additional functionality, such as software updates, enhanced security, and optimization bull Actively participate in mid-level software architectural discussions bull Understanding project limitations and helping ensure expectations meet what is achievable bull Keep schedules, project requirements, specifications, and deliverables through cross-collaboration with Comtechrsquos team members and its clients bull Requirements, design, implementation and testing of software tasks as assigned bull Prepare technical procedures for assembly, testing, and operations bull Maintain code and documentation using revision control Review code developed by other engineers and provide feedback to ensure best practices (e.g., style guidelines, checking code in, accuracy, testability, and efficiency) bull Contribute to existing documentation or educational content and adapt content based on productprogram updates and user feedback bull Triage product or system issues and debugtrackresolve by analyzing the sources of issues and the impact on hardware, network, or service operations and quality bull Write product or system development code bull Other duties as assigned Skills bull Ability to communicate effectively with team members and clients in English or French bull Self-motivated and able to work independently with minimal supervision when required Interested and passionate about staying up to date with technology trends Requirements bull MS or BS in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Computer Science or a related field and 3-5 years of experience as an Embedded Software Engineer or related positions bull Programming experience with RTOS kernel device drivers level bull IP protocols stack knowledge bull Experience in embedded SW development for high-grade ARM processors

SOCs (Cortex A8972...) bull Strong knowledge of C language, GCC (C++ not required)

Comtech Telecommunications Corp. is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or protected veteran status.

industries: IT Services and IT Consulting, Software Development, and Business Consulting and Services
description:
You



You love to build great products and enjoy the challenge of delivering iterative solutions that provide value each step of the way. You enjoy working closely with partners across the business and within your team to solve problems and are equally comfortable working independently. You are comfortable participating in the full SDLC. You know what it takes to maintain existing products and make them better every chance you get. If finding issues and fixing them with robust well-structured code are among the talents that make you tick, we would like to hear from you.



Us



Fieldpoint is the developer of Fieldpoint Software an advanced service management application for time & billing, job costing, professional services automation, and service management with resource scheduling, mobile access, and customer billing.

The development team ensures that our customers always receive high-quality software that transforms their business. Ours is a dynamic working environment that thrives on teamwork, individual skills, and focused effort to get the job done. We continually strive for excellence in ourselves, our products, and our services.

EverCommerce [Nasdaq: EVCM] is a leading service commerce platform, providing vertically-tailored, integrated SaaS solutions that help more than 600,000 global service-based businesses accelerate growth, streamline operations, and increase retention. Our modern digital and mobile applications create predictable, informed, and convenient experiences between customers and their service professionals. Specializing in Home & Field Services, Health Services, and Fitness & Wellness industries, EverCommerce solutions include end-to-end business management software, embedded payment acceptance, marketing technology, and customer engagement applications.



Where



Our office is located in Oakville, Ontario – near the QEW and 403. Fieldpoint’s in-office activities are currently limited. Our staff is working from home, so our initial interviews will be conducted online via phone or ZOOM. Plans for returning to the office will proceed in accordance with physical distancing and other health recommendations.



What You’ll Be Doing




Design, write, maintain, improve, and test our web and mobile applications.

Assist our customer support team by providing explanations and resolutions to complex problems reported by our users.

Effectively contribute suggestions and new ideas to enhance performance and usability.

Research and develop new solutions using new technologies to enhance our existing software applications.

Report to a Team Leader and/or Development Manager.

Willingly take on other tasks as required.




Must Haves




 Skills & Experience: 



 Degree or diploma in Computer Science/related field OR equivalent work experience

2+ years of software development experience in a web-based environment

Proficiency in .NET, HTML/CSS/JavaScript, ASP.Net, and SQL

Experience with version control software and processes

Able to configure and maintain Windows Servers & Services including IIS & MS SQL

Ability to learn quickly

Comfortable working at a small, dynamic company

Can translate business goals into actionable work assignments with minimal direction

Use best practices to document and write quality software, with a commitment to standardization and predictability.

Effective presentation and documentation skills.

Encourages and accepts personal feedback

Can use judgment to solve problems where protocol might not exist




Nice To Haves




Experience working in an Agile development environment

Working knowledge of HTTP, SOAP and RESTful services

Desire to debate and explore new technologies

Web & Mobile technologies such as: Xamarin, Sencha, Angular, React

Design and develop comprehensive automated unit and regression tests

Design and develop comprehensive CI/CD solutions




Benefits And Perks




Flexibility to work where/how you want – in-office, remote (during Covid), or hybrid

Continued investment in your professional development

Robust health and wellness benefits

RRSP; 100% match up to 1.5%

Monthly wellness stipend

Start with 15 days of PTO, 11 holidays, 2 floating days and a day off to volunteer each year

Employee Stock Purchase Program

Staff Enrichment (happy hours, lunches, company culture activities and competitions)


EverCommerce is an equal opportunity employer and we value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status. We look forward to reviewing your credentials and getting to know more about your experience!

industries: IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
Our vision at Vivid Machines is to revolutionize agricultural production to help solve food security globally. Our initial focus is on helping fruit and vegetable farmers improve the quality and quantity of produce they can generate on existing acreage while also improving sustainability. To do this, we are building cutting edge technology, including custom spectral sensors and state-of-the-art machine learning, all while delivering a seamless experience to farmers.




As a Senior Software Engineer, you will have the opportunity to work on challenging problems throughout our software stack, designing and developing robust and scalable solutions across IoT, cloud, and web. You’ll be collaborating with our multidisciplinary team to create an amazing product and solve one of the world’s most important problems.




Do you love solving complex problems, and want to see your work applied in real life? We are looking for people who are self-directed and driven by a desire for excellence as much as by curiosity and a desire to learn by solving previously unsolvable problems.





Who we are and what we do






Vivid Machines
 is an exciting new venture-backed start-up. We’re building cutting edge technology to help fruit and vegetable farmers with yield management, and detection of pests, diseases, and nutrient deficiencies. We have an aggressive goal to bring our products to the world quickly.

Our vision is to revolutionize agricultural production to help farmers solve food security globally!




We 
value
 excellence, integrity, curiosity and passion, people who are open-minded then decisive, and the ability to iterate quickly and deliver. We’re innovators on a mission!




What you will be doing





Collaborate on the vision and architecture for key components of the system design,

Develop core software components and APIs for our system,

Develop core infrastructure components to automate all automatable tasks,

Analyze information and evaluate results to choose the best solution to effectively solve problems,

Work closely with data science, hardware and software teams to optimize the overall product design.









What we’re looking for





The ideal candidate can architect and develop scalable solutions while considering performance, security, and stability. Good knowledge of various disciplines will let you work on software that extends across our entire data pipeline, from our sensor hardware to the front-end. If you are interested in growing in a multidisciplinary engineering environment, this is the position for you!





Degree in computer or software engineering, computer science, or related,

5+ years working experience in industry,

Extensive experience programming in C, C++, Python, JavaScript or similar,

Experience setting up and maintaining CI/CD environments,

Experience with large datasets and management thereof,

Experience with Unix/Linux environments, cloud infrastructure, web application development, information retrieval, networking, developing large software systems, or security software development,

Experience with one or more frontend frameworks, such as React, AngularJS or vue.js,

Demonstrated expertise of software architecture, implementation, and debugging and database design in a language and framework agnostic way

Experience working with open-source software and the surrounding ecosystems

Experience with modern relational or non-relational databases such as Postgres, Redis, MongoDB, Cassandra, etc.,

You are tool-flexible enough to work with whatever we choose next, especially since you’ll be helping us choose.









Bonus points






Experience with MLOps, setting up and maintaining data-driven environments,

Experience with IoT devices and systems,

Experience developing and deploying machine learning models,

Experience with mobile application development.





We have a loft workspace in Toronto, and are following COVID-19 safety guidelines and do enable flexible work arrangements.




People from all backgrounds can succeed at Vivid Machines. We believe differences and diversity help build excellent businesses.









 
Why do you want to work at Vivid Machines?






As an early employee of a VC-backed company, you will have the opportunity to help shape the company vision, culture and products,

You can help build an amazing product in a company that plans to change the world,

You will be offered competitive compensation,

Competitive benefits package

Open, friendly, collaborative company culture,

Company-sponsored team events and retreats,

Free drinks and snacks.






Where to from here?





We want to ensure it’s a good fit on both sides, so you get a job you love, and we offer you a place you’re proud to work at.





Vivid Machines is an equal opportunity employer committed to providing a working environment that embraces and values inclusion and diversity.

industries: Software Development
description:
Broadway is seeking Senior Front End Software Engineers to develop state-of-the-art front-end applications for our groundbreaking automated trading platform. We engineer and manage high-frequency, low-latency, distributed trading systems that allow our customers to trade around the clock. Our platform technology simplifies creating and extending these large-scale, high-performance, integrated systems.

 

We are a growing international enterprise software company that is built and run by engineers, with a long track record building software that powers the trading systems of some of the largest banks in the world. We write the software and supply APIs to allow those banks to focus on what they do best: modeling and predicting the direction of the market based on real time data that flows through our applications.

 

Broadway’s solutions are built on the Toc, our core platform for scalable high-performance distributed computing. For nearly two decades, we’ve been using the Toc to build intelligent trading systems for leading financial institutions.




As part of our team of collaborative, talented engineers, you will own (typically multiple months-long) development projects end-to-end, from conception through support and maintenance, including many fast-cycle version iterations. You will have significant freedom and self-direction to tackle a wealth of interesting and challenging problems.





Responsibilities



Work with a combination of modern web technologies (HTML5, TypeScript, Angular) and windows desktop development (C#, .NET) to design, implement and maintain new user-facing features

Produce exemplary code and deliver completed projects on time

Create and track project plans and convey status, issues and risks effectively

Perform unit and system level testing on your application and all affected systems

Work closely with customer-facing technical consultants to ensure that development efforts truly meet customer needs

Work closely with technical leads to ensure effective coordination and integration between interrelated projects

Play a key role in the development of best practices in software design, implementation, and coding standards

Lead and mentor junior engineers






Behavioral Profile



Self-starter with ability to self-regulate and problem-solve independently through obstacles in a dynamic, fast-paced environment

Results-driven with a strong ownership mentality and drive to deliver on schedule; maintains realistic estimations and escalates proactively when necessary

Superior abstract thinking abilities

Motivated to learn about new industries, master new technologies, and push technological boundaries

Connects code to the business problems being solved and translates effectively across business and technical boundaries

Team player who openly shares information, helps others, and is open to new ideas and “going the extra mile” when needed






Requirements



5+ years of experience in front-end development utilizing industry standards and best practices

Advanced experience in reactive web front-end development, specifically HTML5, CSS/SCSS, TypeScript, Angular 10+

Single Page Application experience

Experience developing windows desktop front-end applications using C#/Winforms/WPF is a plus

Exceptional programming skills and grasp of software engineering principles

Demonstrated success managing development projects end-to-end with significant ownership over technical decision-making.

Experience with using Git version control

Familiarity with SQL and databases

Bachelor’s or advanced degree in Computer Science or related field






Nice to Haves



Enterprise software experience or experience with financial software and/or financial trading

Experience with financial broker/exchange APIs (e.g. price feeds, order execution)

industries: Software Development
description:
The Deploy and Release team at CircleCI is focused on building continuous deployment and release orchestration capabilities in order to provide our customers with the tools they need to release software faster with near-100% reliability.




We're looking for an experienced backend engineer to join our team. As an Engineer on the Deploy and Release team, you will help deliver increased engineering and business confidence in product changes by providing easy-to-adopt, easy-to-use CD and release automation and insights.

This is a full-time remote role as a Senior Software Engineer (Level E3 in our engineering career ladder.) Read our blog post if you'd like to learn more about our internal career growth system.





What you’ll do:




Design and build new features, simplify existing services, and scale our systems as we rapidly grow and evolve.
.


Write code that’s easily readable, testable, and maintainable
, with an eye towards baking in observability from the beginning. Our tech stack includes Kubernetes, Go and Typescript/React. You needn't be a specialist in everything; T-shaped folks interested in learning are ideal.


Partner with members of a multi-functional team and other stakeholders to set the direction of our platform and product
: learn about our business problems, explore solutions, weigh design tradeoffs, write effective user stories, and prioritize them to deliver maximum value in a sustainable, incremental fashion.


Participate in our on-call rotation
 to help our customers when they need it most.






What we're looking for:



Years of professional experience with the care and feeding of distributed systems in production environments at scale.

You’re comfortable navigating the ambiguity and change of a rapidly-growing company.

You know how to work transparently and collaboratively within a fully distributed organization.

Experience being on call.






We’re Particularly Interested In People Who:



Strive for continuous learning and improvement for themselves and their teams.

Want to ensure that all of our systems - software and human - scale efficiently.

Model good work/life balance for their colleagues.






CircleCI Engineering Competency Matrix:


The Engineering Competency Matrix is our internal career growth system for engineers. This position is level E3. If you’re not sure this is you, we encourage you to apply. Find more about the matrix in this blog post.





Work remotely with our globally distributed team!


We’re a distributed company with teammates across the world. For this role, we are hiring engineers to work remotely in East Canada, Ireland, Germany, United Kingdom, and the Netherlands!





About CircleCI


CircleCI is the world’s largest shared continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) platform, and the central hub where code moves from idea to delivery. As one of the most-used DevOps tools that processes more than 1 million builds a day, CircleCI has unique access to data on how engineering teams work, and how their code runs. Companies like Spotify, Coinbase, and BuzzFeed use us to improve engineering team productivity, release better products, and get to market faster.




CircleCI is proud to be an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, gender expression, transgender status, sexual stereotypes, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics. We also consider qualified applicants with criminal histories, consistent with applicable federal, state and local law.




Colorado Salary Range: $123,500 - $145,000/year

#LI-KO1

Level: Mid-Senior Level

Produce8 Inc.
 is a venture-backed startup launched out of the Top Down Ventures incubator. We are building a new category of collaboration software that will provide digital-first and remote teams real-time visibility into the work they are doing across all of their business applications. The product is currently in an invite-only beta with a planned launch in 2022.





The Opportunity


We are looking for a 
Senior Frontend Developer
 to join our product team. You will have the opportunity to take raw business requirements and translate them into our rapidly growing product. You will be a key part of crafting a new category of software that will revolutionize the way companies and employees manage the changing nature of work - helping them optimize their use of their technology and their time. Working under the guidance of a knowledgeable and experienced leadership and advisory team, you'll have the chance to work on an early-stage product being crafted for a multi-billion dollar market.

You'll be working in a well-funded startup with a small team of hands-on engineers and product leaders building something awesome in a market that they know intimately. We have a solid product concept, stable funding, a great advisory group, and a deeply experienced engineering and product team. We need you to join us to help make it happen!

You'll be working remotely from anywhere in Canada.





What you’ll be doing


The primary focus of this role will be to help grow the Produce8 products so we can deliver the best product on the market. You will:


Build product features for our web app and browser plugin that are responsive, performant, and accessible that engage audiences through the use of animation and complex interactions

Build reusable components with React, Typescript, HTML, and CSS for use across our products and document them in our design system

Write tests to make sure we can move fast while being confident things won’t break

Partner with product management, design, engineering, and our users to craft incredible experiences

Contribute your energy and ideas to drive features from initial concepts to launch, experimenting, making mistakes, learning, and iterating along the way

Keep up with and learn the latest front-end technologies and standards to make sure we’re always using the best tools and techniques possible.





We are remote-first, so you'll be working from your home office and need to be available for team meetings during PST working hours. We have a beautiful office space in downtown Vancouver that we can when needed but we’re open to candidates outside the lower mainland as well.





About You



You have 5+ years of experience working on production scale 
SaaS
 applications in a variety of languages

You have experience working on complex apps that are server-rendered with lots of client-side interactivity

You like building web apps and bringing them to life with great design and animation

You are curious and passionate to constantly learn new things; we change fast, and we need the people who work here to be able to change and learn fast too

You enjoy solving big challenges with a great team

You enjoy working with small and cohesive teams

You're comfortable sharing your knowledge and skills with teammates as well as asking for help when you need it

You want to help build a new product from scratch

You're independent and can work from your home office effectively






Our Tech Stack



React and Next JS

Typescript

GraphQL, Apollo, Sanity

CSS and Styled Components

AWS Appsync, Cognito, Dynamo, etc...






Working at Produce8 Inc.



A collaborative work environment with cross-functional teams, working in proximity to multiple, rapid-growth SaaS companies at varying stages of growth

Mentorship from industry veterans with a 100% track record of industry success in funding and scaling software companies creates endless career opportunities

Fun. You should like where you work and the people you work with

Happy hour Fridays (on Zoom for now)

A culture of openness, respect, and inclusivity






Perks, Perks, Perks



Competitive salary + Stock Options

Access to world-class offices and facilities in downtown Vancouver’s most exclusive business neighbourhood with beautiful ocean/mountain views for use if/when we need it

Fully stocked bar, organic local coffee, snacks, food, and an amazing gym

Brand-new laptop and budget for home office equipment etc.

Top of the line employee benefits package including 100% extended health and dental

Green commuter subsidies for hybrid or on-site workers including access to world-class bike facilities






About Us


We embarked on this mission because we truly love building great products and everything we do is oriented towards creating an environment that fosters innovation and excellence.


Autonomy within the team and take ownership of features and components

Frequent knowledge sharing and pair programming is encouraged

Work from home with an emphasis on focus time and flow

Results-oriented leadership (it's what we produce that matters most)

High trust and transparency between all team members

We're never standing still, learning is constant and time is spent to learn and adopt new ideas into our product






About Top Down Ventures


Top Down Ventures is a Vancouver-based incubator with a track record of bringing successful SaaS business applications to market. Our competitive advantage over other investment firms comes from our superior knowledge of the Managed Services Provider (MSP) and Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) markets, and our comprehensive support infrastructure. Our expertise in sales, marketing, operations, finance, and human resources -- in addition to our unique go-to-market platform -- allows the businesses we invest in to focus on their core business while we help them implement the proven, back-end formula.

industries: IT Services and IT Consulting, Software Development, and Internet Publishing
description:
Company Description

 
Dropbox is a leading global collaboration platform that's transforming the way people work together, from the smallest business to the largest enterprise. With more than 500 million registered users across more than 180 countries, our mission is to design a more enlightened way of working. From our headquarters in San Francisco to eight dedicated Studios and a worldwide team of employees who choose where they work best, our Virtual First approach is leading the way into the future of work.

 
Team Description

 
 




Role Description



As a Dropbox intern, you are part of a top-notch learning experience with engineers from all backgrounds. You’ll work side-by-side with a dedicated, experienced engineer as your mentor and have ownership of a high-impact project. 
Our goal is to create a robust and impactful learning experience. You can expect to learn how to collaborate with full-timers across the engineering, product, and design teams and receive regular and effective feedback on your work. We’ll also help you connect with fellow interns, establish mentors, and build the foundation of a strong professional network. 
We will work with you to accommodate your school end and start dates culminating in a minimum of a 12-week long internship. 



Responsibilities



As an intern, you work side-by-side with Dropbox engineers. Here are some examples numerous types of roles and teams that you can have an impact on:



Product Engineering
- Build delightful full-stack user experiences that tackle real customer needs and help drive tons of revenue for Dropbox. As a product engineering intern you can expect to work across backend, API, desktop, mobile and web.


Infrastructure Engineering
- Craft the building blocks that let us scale Dropbox to handle millions of concurrent connections, hundreds of billions of files, and hundreds of petabytes of data.


Analytics
 
Engineering
- Measure, optimize, and build one of the industry’s most advanced analytics platforms to derive insights from vast amounts of data. Our massive scale means you’ll work with more data than many other analytics firms combined.


Mobile
 
Engineering
- Craft the Dropbox client experience on mobile devices by learning and applying the ins and outs of iOS and Android SDK using Objective-C, Swift, Java and C++. You are also responsible for building the backend systems that power the mobile experiences and optimize the protocol between client and server for reliability, efficiency and speed.


Front End Engineering
- Help keep our websites up and running by applying everything our application engineers do with the curiosity and interest in building fast, scalable, and responsive Dropbox experiences for the modern web, using technologies like Typescript, React, and Redux. 


Site
 
Reliability
 
Engineering
 
(SRE)
- Build the software and automation that controls the hardware to run our products. Work with a team who lives on the boundary of software and hardware and develop a deep understanding of the inner workings of our products, our commitment to ensuring our products work well on real-world hardware in our data centers, and serve as the first line of defense when something goes with our production infrastructure or services.


Security
 
Engineering
- People trust Dropbox to keep their data secure, and at Dropbox we rely on our security engineers to make our products safe. You are a software engineer with a deep interest in building software that is secure yet easy to use. Security engineers collaborate with product teams to secure our software, production infrastructure, website, desktop and mobile apps and our corporate infrastructure and devices.




Requirements




Currently pursuing a BS or MS in Computer Science or related technical field involving coding (e.g., physics or mathematics), or equivalent technical experience

Experience writing or shipping software as part of coursework, personal projects, internships, coding competitions or research

Passion for learning, solving problems, and challenging the status quo




Benefits and Perks



Team of mentors committed to your success

Market competitive salary

Individual medical, dental, & vision insurance coverage

Intimate discussions with company executives

Curated social programming to network with other interns and Dropboxers 

Flexible work location - near a Dropbox Studio or from home

Hack Week

 Employee Resource Groups  



*Full time employee benefits below


 
Dropbox is an equal opportunity employer. We are a welcoming place for everyone, and we do our best to make sure all people feel supported and connected at work. A big part of that effort is our support for members and allies of internal groups like Asians at Dropbox, BlackDropboxers, Latinx, Pridebox (LGBTQ), Vets at Dropbox, Women at Dropbox, ATX Diversity (based in Austin, Texas) and the Dropbox Empowerment Network (based in Dublin, Ireland).

Intimate discussions with company executives

Curated social programming to network with other interns and Dropboxers 

Flexible work location - near a Dropbox Studio or from home

Hack Week

 Employee Resource Groups  



*Full time employee benefits below


 
Dropbox is an equal opportunity employer. We are a welcoming place for everyone, and we do our best to make sure all people feel supported and connected at work. industries: Software Development
description:
Do What You Love. Love What You Do.


At Workday, we help the world’s largest organizations adapt to what’s next by bringing finance, HR, and planning into a single enterprise cloud. We work hard, and we’re serious about what we do. But we like to have fun, too. We put people first, celebrate diversity, drive innovation, and do good in the communities where we live and work.


About The Team


Would you enjoy the quick decision-making of an innovative small team while benefiting from the stability of a large corporation? Do you enjoy working in collaborative systems, such as Slack and Microsoft Teams and wish you could do more there? Our team creates applications for the systems our customers' work in on a day to day basis, including, but not limited to, Slack and Microsoft Teams. Our products meet workers how and where they prefer to work. We surface the key most common Workday interactions, notifications and information into these systems, so that our users can complete their tasks quickly and easily and get on with their day. We have the opportunity to help our customers be more efficient and effective with their time. Whether you want to work for a team that values work life balance and camaraderie, build cutting edge software that will be used by millions, or want to work for a market leader named a top workplace, join us on the Workday Everywhere Team. We’re a driven, dynamic and entrepreneurial team motivated to build a product that is based on user research.


About The Role



Work closely with product management and peers to design, implement and test an entire product.

Work closely with technical architects and thought leaders at leading technology companies on integrations

Continually test, refactor and maintain code.

Perform code reviews.

Contribute ideas for continually improving the team’s productivity, job enjoyment and code quality.

Propose and execute on mini-research/prototype projects that introduce an innovative solution to new or existing problems.

Have fun engineering software!




About You




Basic Qualifications




5+ years software engineering experience

Experience with both server-oriented / backend development and front-end development.




Other Qualifications



Ability to rapidly understand JavaScript/TypeScript code

Proven track record of delivering production quality apps.

Strong communication skills for both technical and strategic discussions with extended organization.

Experience and passion about Agile methodologies.

A desire to think about user experience and provide feedback on design and UX.

Experience with the AWS ecosystem is a plus.



As a federal contractor, Workday is requiring all new hires to verify that they are fully-vaccinated against COVID-19 within 72 hours of beginning employment with Workday, consistent with applicable law. Workday is an equal opportunity employer. Candidates who are not vaccinated due to a sincerely held religious belief, medical reasons, or other legally-protected reason should contact accommodations@workday.com to explore what, if any, reasonable accommodations or exemptions Workday is able to offer.


Colorado Equal Pay Statement:


Disclosure required by sb19-085 (8-5-20) of the minimum salary compensation for this role to be located in the state of Colorado. Minimum salary for the role is listed below. As a part of the compensation package, this role may include eligible bonuses, equity and commissions. For more information regarding Workday benefits, please click here.

Colorado minimum salary: $113,300.00

Pursuant to applicable Fair Chance law, Workday will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.

Workday is an Equal Opportunity Employer including individuals with disabilities and protected veterans.


Are you being referred to one of our roles? If so, ask your connection at Workday about our Employee Referral process!

industries: Software Development
description:
Do What You Love. Love What You Do.


At Workday, we help the world’s largest organizations adapt to what’s next by bringing finance, HR, and planning into a single enterprise cloud. We work hard, and we’re serious about what we do. But we like to have fun, too. We put people first, celebrate diversity, drive innovation, and do good in the communities where we live and work.


About The Team


Welcome to the Reporting and Analytics Engine team. This team is responsible for improving and scaling the reporting and analytics engine to query and operate on large volumes of transactions for critically important business needs, interactive analytics and background extractions.


About The Role


We are looking for an incredible engineer for one of our project areas called Core Reporting. In this area, we focus on improving the reporting experience for large volume applications like Accounting Center. We also work closely with our product management and application teams to ensure the reporting runtime is designed to customer expectations. The team in Core Reporting supports over 2B executions every month across all Workday customers. In this role you will work in a team of highly motivated and dedicated engineers working in a fast paced environment.


About You




About You




You love working on complex technical projects with some unknowns

You are passionate about reporting tools and functionality that solve customer problems

You enjoy researching new ideas and ensuring that adds value to our customers

You have experience with Java systems

You care about customer satisfaction and solving customer problems

You care about code quality and advocate for best development practices

You are a team-player, enjoys working with team members and collaborating across teams to build new solutions

You are eager to learn Workday technologies, like Xpresso





Basic Qualifications:




5+ years of experience as a software engineer

Excellent coding skills, Java




Other Qualifications:



Superb communication skills. Ability to articulate sophisticated technical ideas

Proven experience building and delivering high-performance processing

Highly motivated to determine how things work

Good grasp of SQL

Ability to connect business needs with technology

Masters or Bachelors in Computer Science




Are you being referred to one of our roles? If so, ask your connection at Workday about our Employee Referral process!

industries: IT Services and IT Consulting, Software Development, and Internet Publishing
description:
Description



The multi-screen streaming video and the interactive TV space is growing rapidly. Accedo delivers rich media apps on multiple platforms ranging from Smart TVs, gaming consoles and media devices to smart phones and tablets.

At Accedo, you will be part of a diverse and multi-disciplined development team, gaining exposure to cutting-edge technologies. This means working with some of the largest global media brands in the industry, e.g. Netflix, Spotify, BBC, HBO and Deutsche Telekom, just to name a few. Working in a highly collaborative and international environment, you will help transform requirements and designs into high performing feature rich applications on a wide variety of web based platforms and devices.


Who are we?


We are Accedo and have more than ten years of experience helping hundreds of TV platform operators, broadcasters, media companies, and consumer electronics manufacturers across the globe to design, deliver and manage the next generation video user experience across a vast range of connected devices.

Accedo offers a truly global working environment, with offices all over the world, including Stockholm, London, New York, Silicon Valley, Sydney, and Hong Kong, amongst others.

At the end of the day, our employees are what make us who we are, which means we work hard to create a good working environment with plenty of opportunities to grow and develop within Accedo, wherever they want to be in the world. We are on a journey, and are always open to ideas and individuals that want to contribute to making that journey a success.

Accedo is looking for a talented Solutions Engineer to join its growing Sales team in Toronto, Canada. At Accedo you will be part of a diverse and multi-disciplined team, gain exposure to cutting edge technologies and can work with some of the largest global media brands in the industry. Working in a highly collaborative environment, you will help transform requirements and designs into high performing and feature rich applications on a wide variety of web based platforms and devices. This is an exciting opportunity for a detail-oriented person who is passionate about technology. If this sounds like you, we want you to apply!


Objective of Role


As a Solutions Engineer, you will be responsible for leading technical solutions on pre-and post-sales support for new and existing customers. You will be a key contributor to the sales cycle by identifying key customer requirements related to technical subject-matter expertise to aid the sales team in growing the revenue. You will have a wealth of experience presenting technical solutions and demonstrating prototypes on Accedo’s products and services.



Main Tasks




Engage in conference calls, in person visits, respond to RFP/RFI’s and address all technical due diligence during each phase of the sales cycle 

Assist the sales team in achieving specific direct sales revenue goals by managing the technical sales portion of the prospecting and provisioning stages, using a thorough understanding of Accedo’s product and services

Understand the complexities associated with the delivery of OTT and TVE products with the ability to empathize and solve for a customer’s pain points

Work closely with Project Managers, Developers, and others to understanding business requirements

Responsible for technical pre-sales design, development and delivery recommendations and justifications

Evangelize and demo proof of concepts and other products built by Accedo to prospects and at trade shows

Possess the ability to develop PoCs for client solutions




Requirements




Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering, Computer Science or related field

Experience in the television/media steaming vertical

Familiarity with app development and video streaming technology ecosystem

Ability to analyze, articulate and solve complex problems

Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with equally good listening skills

Previous experience as a technology consultant or customer facing role

Good relationship building abilities with customer focused mindset

Experience in high-paced customer facing assignments working with senior executives

Ability to prototype and create proof of concept solutions without heavy resource or time investments

Must be comfortable with up to 25% travel time and willing to travel on short notice

We are looking for senior full-stack developers to join our product team and help us deliver on our roadmap as we become the leading employee experience brand in the world. 

 

Sparrow uses Microsoft Azure services, Azure functions, RESTFul APIs, SQL Server, and Cosmos DB. Successful candidates will work across the different layers in our development stack, implementing UI elements, designing scalable APIs, and connecting the two. This includes all associated areas such as database and architecture design.

 

Responsibilities will include working closely with Sparrow’s technical leadership team to design and implement highly scalable and testable code across the Microsoft Azure stack. Successful candidates will have a minimum of three years’ recent experience with the skills listed below.

 

We're looking for developers passionate about computer science, those who believe in the beauty of well-designed and testable code. 

 

As a member of the product team, you'll be helping transform internal communications at companies around the world, making employees feel more engaged and be better informed. 





Company


Sparrow’s a silicon-valley funded product company based in Canada. We’re looking for senior developers to join our product team and help us deliver on more of our roadmap faster as we continue to scale. Every day, Sparrow helps our customers get the right information to the right employees across many distribution channels. Connected and informed employees are more productive, more engaged, and happier. We believe everyone should feel that way.

 

Our culture is centered around a few key ideas: getting things done, health & family first, no blame – we’re one team.

 

The type of people we’re looking for are those who enjoy getting things done, sharing what they know, and who are highly adaptable. 





Position Overview


You will be a key member of the product development team and working with our product owner, architecture, UX, and development teams.





Responsibilities:



Architecting and Implementing endpoints/services

Architecting and Implementing changes to our Cosmos and SQL databases

“Pixel-perfect” implementation of our approved user interface

Ensuring the entire stack is designed and built for speed and scalability

Design and construction of our REST API

Integrating our front-end UI with the constructed API

Design and implementation of continuous integration, unit tests, and deployment

Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders

Pull Request review and participation in stand-ups, retrospectives and company meetings

Providing your ideas for enhancements and improvements to our product

Providing expert input and advice in relation to technical design, standards, and best practices.






Required Skills



Legally able to work for a Canadian company (Permanent resident, citizen, open visa)

3+ years of experience creating Endpoint services (micro-services)

3+ years of experience integrating/Connecting to Azure services, including: Cognitive Services, Media Services, Queues, Azure Functions, Service Bus

3+ years of experience designing/Enhancing data with Cosmos, SQL, or similar databases

3+ years of experience building interfaces in React, including Redux, Redux Saga

3+ years of experience using C# and Typescript

Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as GitHub

3+ years working with in SaaS web based applications and start-ups






Compensation includes


Salary, stock options, benefits.





Education Requirement


Ideally, you have a computer science or software engineering or related degree, but we know degrees don’t mean everything.

job_title: Développeur Angular Sénior - IBM iX, services-conseils IBM
industries: Computer Hardware Manufacturing
description:
530633BR


Introduction


Menez IBM vers l'avenir en traduisant les exigences systèmes dans la conception et l'élaboration de systèmes personnalisés dans un environnement agile. Le succès d'IBM est entre vos mains au fur et à mesure que vous transformez les besoins d'affaires essentiels en code et que vous stimulez l'innovation. Votre travail fortifiera mondialement IBM et ses clients, par la collaboration et l'intégration de code dans les systèmes d'entreprise. Vous aurez accès à la formation, aux outils et aux technologies les plus récents, et à un cheminement de carrière illimité avec le chef de file mondial de la technologie. Venez chez IBM et ayez un impact à l'échelle planétaire!

Votre rôle et vos responsabilités

Nous sommes à un tournant de l'histoire où l'impact de la technologie sur les entreprises est suffisamment important pour transformer l'ensemble de leur mode de fonctionnement. La convergence des nouvelles technologies exponentielles telles que l'IA, le cloud, la mobilité, l'automatisation, l'internet des objets, la blockchain et la 5G ont le pouvoir de changer les modèles d'entreprise, de réinventer les processus et de réimaginer la façon dont nous travaillons tous.

IBM Consulting a pour vocation d'aider ses clients à gérer l'ampleur des changements nécessaires pour rester en tête et à innover sans relâche. Nous établissons des relations solides avec nos clients et créons ensemble des solutions à l'intersection de la stratégie, de l'expérience, de la technologie et des opérations. Nous agissons en tant qu'agents du changement : nous donnons aux clients les moyens d'élaborer une stratégie et de mettre en œuvre leur vision, ce qui leur permet d'évoluer à grande échelle avec rapidité et clarté.

Chez IBM iX au sein du groupe de transformation de la clientèle et de l'expérience d'IBM Consulting, nous sommes des pionniers réalistes, soucieux d'imaginer et de créer des solutions numériques de bout en bout axées sur le client final. Nous appliquons une conception centrée sur l'humain et des méthodologies agiles pour repenser la manière dont nos clients travaillent et s'engagent auprès de leurs clients, et pour donner rapidement vie à ces solutions numériques axées sur l'expérience. Voulez-vous faire partie de l'équipe qui définit l'avenir de l'expérience des supporters des équipes sportives professionnelles ? Que diriez-vous d'aider les institutions de services financiers à se transformer à l'ère de la transformation avec l'accélération de l'innovation numérique stimulée par le changement de comportement des clients dû à la pandémie ? Et qu'en est-il de l'aide apportée aux compagnies pétrolières et gazières pour améliorer la sécurité et la productivité des travailleurs sur le terrain ? C'est votre chance de faire partie d'une équipe où tout ce que nous faisons a un impact mesurable à grande échelle.


Tâches Et Responsabilités


En tant que Développeur-maître Angular Sénior chez IBM iX (sous IBM Consulting), vous êtes un membre de l'équipe qui permet de concrétiser la conception du produit de notre client dans les délais impartis et de manière sécurisée, fiable, réutilisable et évolutive. Grâce à votre expérience agile au sein d'organisations centrées sur le produit, vous êtes l'un des membres de l'équipe travaillant aux côtés d'une équipe de livraison pour assurer la fourniture réussie d'applications web et mobiles et d'autres expériences numériques de première mise sur le marché.Vos responsabilités en tant que Développeur-maître Sénior sont les suivantes :



Gérer le développement complet de logiciels pour nos clients, de la conception au déploiement, dans le cadre de leur transformation numérique, en assurant l'alignement sur l'architecture actuelle et en développement.

Participer aux réunions quotidiennes de la mêlée et fournir une orientation technique aux autres membres de l'équipe.

Collaborer avec les parties prenantes et les concepteurs d'architecture pour s'assurer que la solution est conforme aux exigences et à la stratégie. Participer à l'examen et à la sélection des technologies (langages / cadres et bibliothèques).

Appliquer les modèles de conception, les normes de codage et les meilleures pratiques pour produire un code sûr, fiable, réutilisable et évolutif.

Identifier, trier et analyser les causes profondes des problèmes spécifiques au développement.

Intégrer des implémentations d'interface utilisateur avec des API sécurisées et non sécurisées.

Travailler avec les parties prenantes internes et clientes pour définir et clarifier les exigences fonctionnelles et non fonctionnelles.

Aide à l'estimation et à l'effort requis pour construire les composants clés

Préparer, documenter et présenter la conception et la documentation technique

Exercer un leadership technique grâce à son expertise en la matière et à sa connaissance du domaine

Contribuer à l'amélioration des processus, en signalant tous les problèmes et en contribuant activement à leur résolution

Animer des réunions et des séances de travail régulières avec les membres de l'équipe de développement et les différentes unités commerciales afin de traiter les questions en cours qui nécessitent une compréhension ou une analyse plus approfondie

Contribuer à l'élaboration du cadre architectural et de la conception



Votre profil



Vous apprenez rapidement et vous vous adaptez : vous pouvez vous familiariser avec de nouvelles technologies rapidement, de manière approfondie et avec confiance, en vous appuyant sur des concepts que vous comprenez déjà.

Vous avez un style de travail interactif : vous vous épanouissez en travaillant à la fois en équipe et individuellement lorsque cela est nécessaire, y compris avec des équipes mondiales et extraterritoriales pour la mise en œuvre.

Vous êtes un communicateur hors pair : vous avez fait preuve d'excellence dans la communication et la présentation d'informations complexes à des parties prenantes tant techniques que non techniques.

Vous êtes un gourou de l'estimation des tâches : vous pouvez rapidement évaluer l'effort relatif d'une tâche de développement, en tenant compte des ambiguïtés et de la complexité, en vous appuyant sur votre vaste expérience professionnelle antérieure.

Vous avez le sens de l'initiative et un grand souci du détail : vous effectuez des examens de code de qualité par des pairs et vous avez des exigences élevées et un grand souci de la réussite et de la satisfaction des clients. 

Nous recrutons dans les villes principales du pays. Les candidats retenus pour un poste à Montréal, QC, doivent être parfaitement bilingues en anglais et en français. 



Expertise professionnelle et technique requise


Qualifications Requises


Les candidats retenus seront en mesure de démontrer les caractéristiques suivantes :



Diplôme de Bachelor dans un des domaines suivants : informatique, ingénierie, MIS ou domaine connexe.

3-5 ans d' expérience dans la technologie ou dans un domaine connexe , avec une expérience pertinente dans les projets numériques centrés sur l'utilisateur. 

Expérience des technologies dedéveloppement web, notamment HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ainsi que de l'utilisation d'un ou plusieurs des outils Angular, React, Vue.

Expérience des technologies multiplateformes telles que Flutter, ReactNative, NativeScript.

Expérience avec un des deux systèmes NodeJS et Java

Familiarité avec l'intégration et la prise en charge de fonctionnalités fournies par des SDK ou des bibliothèques externes (par exemple, push, analytique, CMS).

Maîtrise de l'utilisation d'un système de gestion du code source tel que Git, ainsi qu'une connaissance pratique des pratiques devops (par exemple, l'intégration/livraison continue).

Compréhension des modèles de conception, de l'optimisation, de la sécurité des API et des meilleures pratiques de codage sécurisé.

Expérience dans la création de solutions pour le web responsable et mobile

Compréhension du cycle de vie du développement logiciel et des principes de mise en œuvre agile

Connaissance des systèmes de conteneurs comme Docker et de l'orchestration de conteneurs comme Kubernetes

Maîtrise des outils de gestion des projets agiles (par exemple, Confluence et Jira).

Une parfaite maîtrise de l'anglais.



Expertise professionnelle et technique privilégié


Qualifications Supplémentaires




Maîtrise ou l'équivalent;

Maîtrise du français




Ce que nous offrons




Une culture d'entreprise axée sur le travail d'équipe, qui met l'accent sur le bien-être et l'inclusion des employés, avec des commentaires constructifs et des possibilités d'apprentissage continu, y compris le développement des compétences en matière de gestion par l'intermédiaire de la Leadership Academy d'IBM

Rémunération compétitive, avantages sociaux complets et conditions de travail flexibles. Nous continuons à développer nos avantages et nos programmes, offrant ainsi un soutien, des conseils et une couverture parmi les meilleurs pour un personnel diversifié

Un tout nouveau bureau IBM situé au cœur du centre-ville de Toronto, au 16 York Street (ouverture en décembre 2021)




La méthode IBM



En Tant Qu'IBMers


Chez IBM , nos méthodes de travail définissent qui nous sommes et nous permettent d'atteindre notre objectif.



 Nous établissons un lien de confiance

 Nous collaborons pour réussir

 Nous évoluons avec une inlassable curiosité

 Nous innovons dans un but précis

 Nous livrons avec impact

 nous encourageons la diversité des perspectives (voir plus ci-dessous)




La diversité chez IBM


Chez IBM, nous encourageons la diversité des perspectives et nous nous engageons à apporter un large éventail de points de vue, d'expériences et de compétences à notre travail afin de favoriser un environnement véritablement inclusif. Nous encourageons fortement les candidatures de tous les candidats qualifiés qui représentent toute la diversité des communautés à travers le Canada. Cela inclut, sans s'y limiter, les peuples autochtones, les personnes issues de communautés noires et raciales diverses, les personnes handicapées, les personnes issues de communautés sexuées et sexuellement diverses et/ou les personnes ayant des identités transgenres. IBM est fier d'être un employeur offrant l'égalité des chances et s'engage également à respecter toutes les pratiques d'emploi équitables concernant la citoyenneté et le statut d'immigration.

Doit avoir la capacité de travailler au Canada sans parrainage.

A propos de l'unité commerciale

IBM Services est une équipe de conseillers d'affaires, de stratégie et de technologie qui conçoivent, construisent, et exploitent des systèmes de base et des services qui constituent l'épine dorsale de l'économie mondiale. IBM Services fait équipe avec les plus grandes entreprises du monde dans plus de 170 pays afin de bâtir des affaires plus intelligentes en repensant et en réinventant par la technologie, avec ses méthodologies axées sur les résultats, son portefeuille de pointe et son expertise en recherche et en activités de calibre mondial qui mènent à une innovation axée sur les résultats et à une excellence durable.

Votre vie chez IBM

Envie d'en savoir plus? Prêt à résoudre certains des défis parmi les plus uniques au monde? Et prêt à façonner l'avenir de millions de personnes?

Si c'est le cas, il est alors temps de vous joindre à nous, d'exprimer votre individualité, de laisser le champ libre à votre curiosité et d'explorer de nouvelles possibilités.

Chaque IBMiste (ou IBMiste potentiel comme vous) dispose d'une voix, trace son propre chemin et propose son expertise en vue d'aider à cocréer et à enrichir notre histoire. Ensemble, nous avons le pouvoir d'apporter des changements significatifs, de modifier la structure de nos clients, de la société et d'IBM elle-même, d'avoir un effet vraiment positif et de faire de ce monde un meilleur endroit pour tous.

Le moment est venu de définir votre carrière.

À propos d'IBM

La plus grande invention d'IBM, c'est l'IBMiste. Nous sommes convaincus que la mise en application de l'intelligence, de la raison et de la science nous permet d'améliorer l'activité économique, la société et la condition humaine, en donnant vie à la puissance d'un nuage hybride ouvert et d'une stratégie d'IA pour nos clients et nos partenaires du monde entier.

Ayant réinventé sans relâche depuis 1911, nous ne sommes pas seulement l'une des plus grandes entreprises au monde, nous sommes aussi l'un des plus grands employeurs en TI et en services-conseils, avec de nombreuses entreprises du classement Fortune 50 s'appuyant sur IBM Cloud pour gérer leur entreprise.

Chez IBM, nous sommes fiers d'avoir été parmi les premiers à adopter l'intelligence artificielle, l'informatique quantique et la chaîne de blocs. C'est le moment de vous joindre à nous et de devenir un innovateur technologique responsable et une force au service du bien dans le monde.

Énoncé du lieu de travail

Pour obtenir de l’information supplémentaire sur les critères d’emplacement, veuillez contacter le recruteur après avoir soumis votre demande.

Vous et IBM

IBM s'engage à créer un milieu diversifié et est fière de souscrire au principe de l'égalité d'accès à l'emploi. Tous les candidats qualifiés seront pris en considération pour un emploi sans égard à la race, à la couleur, à la religion, ausexe, à l'identité ou à l'expression de genre, à l'orientation sexuelle, à l'origine nationale, à la génétique, à la grossesse, aux handicaps, à l'âge, au statut de vétéran ou à d'autres caractéristiques. IBM s'engage également à se conformer à toutes lespratiques équitables en matière d'emploi à l'égard du statut de citoyen et d'immigrant.

industries: Computer Hardware Manufacturing
description:
529713BR


Introduction


As an Application Developer, you will lead IBM into the future by translating system requirements into the design and development of customized systems in an agile environment. The success of IBM is in your hands as you transform vital business needs into code and drive innovation. Your work will power IBM and its clients globally, collaborating and integrating code into enterprise systems. You will have access to the latest education, tools and technology, and a limitless career path with the world’s technology leader. Come to IBM and make a global impact!


Your Role and Responsibilities


As an Application Developer, you will lead IBM into the future by translating system requirements into the design and development of customized systems in an agile environment. The success of IBM is in your hands as you transform vital business needs into code and drive innovation. Your work will power IBM and its clients globally, collaborating and integrating code into enterprise systems. You will have access to the latest education, tools and technology, and a limitless career path with the world’s technology leader. Come to IBM and make a global impact!

Position Overview

We are looking for Full Stack Python Developers for our new EPS (Expertus Payment Services) Cloud platform. Your role will be to develop and maintain the platform as business needs. You will have to use your skills to achieve innovative solutions by evolving in the ever-growing world of finance, all based on a Cloud Infrastructure.

This platform specializes in end-to-end digital payments, to help clients address the aging payments infrastructures used by banks, credit unions, regulatory agencies and large corporations. It strengthens IBM's portfolio as an end-to-end payments platform solution provider, further advancing IBM's hybrid cloud and AI strategy.


Main Responsibilities




Analyse business needs

Participate in the design and development of solutions according to business needs

Create and update APIs

Create and update batch back-end processing

Create and update static web pages

Maintain the proper functioning of the application

Document the technical choices and the various functionalities carried out

Write effective tests to ensure the stability of the application

Work within a multidisciplinary team.




Required Technical and Professional Expertise




Energy, commitment and motivation

Organization and rigor

Passion to learn new technologies

Experience in back-end and front-end development

Demonstrate innovation in the solutions developed

Programming languages: Python, HTML, CSS, JavaScript

A clear credit check is a requirement for this role




Preferred Technical And Professional Expertise




Deployment cycle: Jenkins, Git

Databases: SQL & NoSQL

University degree or College/CEGEP graduate in Computer sciences

Bilingualism: French and English



Must have the ability to work in Canada without sponsorship.


About Business Unit


IBM Consulting is IBM’s consulting and global professional services business, with market leading capabilities in business and technology transformation. With deep expertise in many industries, we offer strategy, experience, technology, and operations services to many of the most innovative and valuable companies in the world. Our people are focused on accelerating our clients’ businesses through the power of collaboration. We believe in the power of technology responsibly used to help people, partners and the planet.

This role requires you to be fully vaccinated against COVID-19 prior to your start date. Full vaccination refers to receiving dosage of COVID-19 vaccines that provide full protection in accordance with Canada Public Health and WHO guidance (full series of a 2 dose vaccine plus 14 days or a one dose vaccine plus 14 days from the last dose). Proof of vaccination status will be required. Booster vaccination requirements may be required. If you are unable to be vaccinated due to medical or religious reasons, we offer accommodations in accordance with applicable law.


Your Life @ IBM


Are you craving to learn more? Prepared to solve some of the world's most unique challenges? And ready to shape the future for millions of people? If so, then it's time to join us, express your individuality, unleash your curiosity and discover new possibilities.

Every IBMer, and potential ones like yourself, has a voice, carves their own path, and uses their expertise to help co-create and add to our story. Together, we have the power to make meaningful change – to alter the fabric of our clients, of society and IBM itself, to create a truly positive impact and make the world work better for everyone.

It's time to define your career.


About IBM


IBM’s greatest invention is the IBMer. We believe that through the application of intelligence, reason and science, we can improve business, society and the human condition, bringing the power of an open hybrid cloud and AI strategy to life for our clients and partners around the world.

Restlessly reinventing since 1911, we are not only one of the largest corporate organizations in the world, we’re also one of the biggest technology and consulting employers, with many of the Fortune 50 companies relying on the IBM Cloud to run their business.

At IBM, we pride ourselves on being an early adopter of artificial intelligence, quantum computing and blockchain. Now it’s time for you to join us on our journey to being a responsible technology innovator and a force for good in the world.


Location Statement


This role will involve working with technology that is covered by Export Regulations sanctions. If you are a Foreign National from any of the following US sanctioned countries (Cuba, Iran, North Korea, and Syria) on a work permit, you are not eligible for employment in this position.


Being You @ IBM


IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, pregnancy, disability, age, veteran status, or other characteristics. IBM is also committed to compliance with all fair employment practices regarding citizenship and immigration status.

industries: Software Development and Computer and Network Security
description:
It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing!


We're committed to bringing passion and customer focus to the business.



The Role


Proofpoint has created the world's best cloud-based email security and archiving solutions and we are always working on improving and extending our product capabilities. Founded in 2002, the company is based in Sunnyvale, California, in the heart of Silicon Valley.

We are looking for co-op students to work alongside our seasoned developers in our downtown Toronto office (remote until office reopens). These positions are within the engineering team responsible for our cloud-based Proofpoint Email Archive, a software-as-a-service solution featuring an advanced service-oriented architecture with distributed grid search and large-scale storage infrastructure to meet the demanding needs of thousands of users from among the largest businesses in the world. You will spend the co-op work term on projects alongside talented, experienced professionals, gain practical experience in an agile software development environment and get a chance to see what it is like to work for a dynamic, NASDAQ-listed company.

The ideal candidate is someone who is agile and who quickly comes up to speed in a fast-paced technical environment and can adapt to new technologies rapidly.



Job Requirements




Fluent in one at least Java, .NET, C#, C++, XML

Understanding of OO concepts/methodologies

Experience with UNIX/Linux, Windows/.NET

Passion for learning inquiry and problem solving

Excellent written and verbal communication skills


It's a plus if you have these skills


Database skills

JUnit/ NUnit frameworks

MS Exchange and Active Directory

Web services (REST/SOAP)



Candidate Profile


You have the ability and interest in working 
full time
 (a maximum of 
37.5
 hours/week) in our Toronto office or remotely until it is safe to work in office. You are currently pursuing an 
undergraduate degree 
and are successfully maintaining an above average GPA. This internship is scheduled to start in May 2022 and run through August 2023.


If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!

job_title: Développeur Angular Sénior - IBM iX, services-conseils IBM
industries: Computer Hardware Manufacturing
description:
530633BR


Introduction


Menez IBM vers l'avenir en traduisant les exigences systèmes dans la conception et l'élaboration de systèmes personnalisés dans un environnement agile. Le succès d'IBM est entre vos mains au fur et à mesure que vous transformez les besoins d'affaires essentiels en code et que vous stimulez l'innovation. Votre travail fortifiera mondialement IBM et ses clients, par la collaboration et l'intégration de code dans les systèmes d'entreprise. Vous aurez accès à la formation, aux outils et aux technologies les plus récents, et à un cheminement de carrière illimité avec le chef de file mondial de la technologie. Venez chez IBM et ayez un impact à l'échelle planétaire!

Votre rôle et vos responsabilités

Nous sommes à un tournant de l'histoire où l'impact de la technologie sur les entreprises est suffisamment important pour transformer l'ensemble de leur mode de fonctionnement. La convergence des nouvelles technologies exponentielles telles que l'IA, le cloud, la mobilité, l'automatisation, l'internet des objets, la blockchain et la 5G ont le pouvoir de changer les modèles d'entreprise, de réinventer les processus et de réimaginer la façon dont nous travaillons tous.

IBM Consulting a pour vocation d'aider ses clients à gérer l'ampleur des changements nécessaires pour rester en tête et à innover sans relâche. Nous établissons des relations solides avec nos clients et créons ensemble des solutions à l'intersection de la stratégie, de l'expérience, de la technologie et des opérations. Nous agissons en tant qu'agents du changement : nous donnons aux clients les moyens d'élaborer une stratégie et de mettre en œuvre leur vision, ce qui leur permet d'évoluer à grande échelle avec rapidité et clarté.

Chez IBM iX au sein du groupe de transformation de la clientèle et de l'expérience d'IBM Consulting, nous sommes des pionniers réalistes, soucieux d'imaginer et de créer des solutions numériques de bout en bout axées sur le client final. Nous appliquons une conception centrée sur l'humain et des méthodologies agiles pour repenser la manière dont nos clients travaillent et s'engagent auprès de leurs clients, et pour donner rapidement vie à ces solutions numériques axées sur l'expérience. Voulez-vous faire partie de l'équipe qui définit l'avenir de l'expérience des supporters des équipes sportives professionnelles ? Que diriez-vous d'aider les institutions de services financiers à se transformer à l'ère de la transformation avec l'accélération de l'innovation numérique stimulée par le changement de comportement des clients dû à la pandémie ? Et qu'en est-il de l'aide apportée aux compagnies pétrolières et gazières pour améliorer la sécurité et la productivité des travailleurs sur le terrain ? C'est votre chance de faire partie d'une équipe où tout ce que nous faisons a un impact mesurable à grande échelle.


Tâches Et Responsabilités


En tant que Développeur-maître Angular Sénior chez IBM iX (sous IBM Consulting), vous êtes un membre de l'équipe qui permet de concrétiser la conception du produit de notre client dans les délais impartis et de manière sécurisée, fiable, réutilisable et évolutive. Grâce à votre expérience agile au sein d'organisations centrées sur le produit, vous êtes l'un des membres de l'équipe travaillant aux côtés d'une équipe de livraison pour assurer la fourniture réussie d'applications web et mobiles et d'autres expériences numériques de première mise sur le marché.Vos responsabilités en tant que Développeur-maître Sénior sont les suivantes :



Gérer le développement complet de logiciels pour nos clients, de la conception au déploiement, dans le cadre de leur transformation numérique, en assurant l'alignement sur l'architecture actuelle et en développement.

Participer aux réunions quotidiennes de la mêlée et fournir une orientation technique aux autres membres de l'équipe.

Collaborer avec les parties prenantes et les concepteurs d'architecture pour s'assurer que la solution est conforme aux exigences et à la stratégie. Participer à l'examen et à la sélection des technologies (langages / cadres et bibliothèques).

Appliquer les modèles de conception, les normes de codage et les meilleures pratiques pour produire un code sûr, fiable, réutilisable et évolutif.

Identifier, trier et analyser les causes profondes des problèmes spécifiques au développement.

Intégrer des implémentations d'interface utilisateur avec des API sécurisées et non sécurisées.

Travailler avec les parties prenantes internes et clientes pour définir et clarifier les exigences fonctionnelles et non fonctionnelles.

Aide à l'estimation et à l'effort requis pour construire les composants clés

Préparer, documenter et présenter la conception et la documentation technique

Exercer un leadership technique grâce à son expertise en la matière et à sa connaissance du domaine

Contribuer à l'amélioration des processus, en signalant tous les problèmes et en contribuant activement à leur résolution

Animer des réunions et des séances de travail régulières avec les membres de l'équipe de développement et les différentes unités commerciales afin de traiter les questions en cours qui nécessitent une compréhension ou une analyse plus approfondie

Contribuer à l'élaboration du cadre architectural et de la conception



Votre profil



Vous apprenez rapidement et vous vous adaptez : vous pouvez vous familiariser avec de nouvelles technologies rapidement, de manière approfondie et avec confiance, en vous appuyant sur des concepts que vous comprenez déjà.

Vous avez un style de travail interactif : vous vous épanouissez en travaillant à la fois en équipe et individuellement lorsque cela est nécessaire, y compris avec des équipes mondiales et extraterritoriales pour la mise en œuvre.

Vous êtes un communicateur hors pair : vous avez fait preuve d'excellence dans la communication et la présentation d'informations complexes à des parties prenantes tant techniques que non techniques.

Vous êtes un gourou de l'estimation des tâches : vous pouvez rapidement évaluer l'effort relatif d'une tâche de développement, en tenant compte des ambiguïtés et de la complexité, en vous appuyant sur votre vaste expérience professionnelle antérieure.

Vous avez le sens de l'initiative et un grand souci du détail : vous effectuez des examens de code de qualité par des pairs et vous avez des exigences élevées et un grand souci de la réussite et de la satisfaction des clients. 

Nous recrutons dans les villes principales du pays. Les candidats retenus pour un poste à Montréal, QC, doivent être parfaitement bilingues en anglais et en français. 



Expertise professionnelle et technique requise


Qualifications Requises


Les candidats retenus seront en mesure de démontrer les caractéristiques suivantes :



Diplôme de Bachelor dans un des domaines suivants : informatique, ingénierie, MIS ou domaine connexe.

3-5 ans d' expérience dans la technologie ou dans un domaine connexe , avec une expérience pertinente dans les projets numériques centrés sur l'utilisateur. 

Expérience des technologies dedéveloppement web, notamment HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ainsi que de l'utilisation d'un ou plusieurs des outils Angular, React, Vue.

Expérience des technologies multiplateformes telles que Flutter, ReactNative, NativeScript.

Expérience avec un des deux systèmes NodeJS et Java

Familiarité avec l'intégration et la prise en charge de fonctionnalités fournies par des SDK ou des bibliothèques externes (par exemple, push, analytique, CMS).

Maîtrise de l'utilisation d'un système de gestion du code source tel que Git, ainsi qu'une connaissance pratique des pratiques devops (par exemple, l'intégration/livraison continue).

Compréhension des modèles de conception, de l'optimisation, de la sécurité des API et des meilleures pratiques de codage sécurisé.

Expérience dans la création de solutions pour le web responsable et mobile

Compréhension du cycle de vie du développement logiciel et des principes de mise en œuvre agile

Connaissance des systèmes de conteneurs comme Docker et de l'orchestration de conteneurs comme Kubernetes

Maîtrise des outils de gestion des projets agiles (par exemple, Confluence et Jira).

Une parfaite maîtrise de l'anglais.



Expertise professionnelle et technique privilégié


Qualifications Supplémentaires




Maîtrise ou l'équivalent;

Maîtrise du français




Ce que nous offrons




Une culture d'entreprise axée sur le travail d'équipe, qui met l'accent sur le bien-être et l'inclusion des employés, avec des commentaires constructifs et des possibilités d'apprentissage continu, y compris le développement des compétences en matière de gestion par l'intermédiaire de la Leadership Academy d'IBM

Rémunération compétitive, avantages sociaux complets et conditions de travail flexibles. Nous continuons à développer nos avantages et nos programmes, offrant ainsi un soutien, des conseils et une couverture parmi les meilleurs pour un personnel diversifié

Un tout nouveau bureau IBM situé au cœur du centre-ville de Toronto, au 16 York Street (ouverture en décembre 2021)




La méthode IBM



En Tant Qu'IBMers


Chez IBM , nos méthodes de travail définissent qui nous sommes et nous permettent d'atteindre notre objectif.

 Nous collaborons pour réussir

 Nous évoluons avec une inlassable curiosité

 Nous livrons avec impact

 nous encourageons la diversité des perspectives (voir plus ci-dessous)

Chez IBM, nous encourageons la diversité des perspectives et nous nous engageons à apporter un large éventail de points de vue, d'expériences et de compétences à notre travail afin de favoriser un environnement véritablement inclusif.
